title: Winston Churchill: "Never Give In"
description: Winston Churchill was a talented and ambitious young man who became a strong leader for his country. Winston Churchill: Never Give In covers the life and accomplishments of this famous British figure, who played a major role in the history of the twentieth century. Discover how Churchill overcame both personal and professional challenges to become prime minister of Britain and successfully lead his country through the difficult days of World War II. Photographs and maps support the text.
